name: Prometheus Bound
description:
Daron, a Greek Warrior, forged in Olympus by its creator and protector, the Titan Prometheus, adventuring in a fierce fight against Zeus, his armies and powers, to defend all Human Beings ...

Our first Shooter Game, devoloped in Visual C++ with OpenFrameworks.

The Developer Team are:

Luis Gustavo Taborda

Gilberto Taborda Junior

Rodrigo Sieben
